description: This file provides a platform-aware utility function `ping_host` to ping a specified IP address with a timeout. It constructs appropriate ping commands based on OS and handles subprocess execution with error handling.

methods.name: Tuple[bool,str] ping_host(ip: str, timeout_seconds: int = 2)
methods.description: Ping a host in a platform-aware way with timeout, returning whether the host is reachable and a note string.

ctags.name: ping_host
ctags.pattern: /^def ping_host(ip: str, timeout_seconds: int = 2) -> Tuple[bool, str]:$/
